short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin highlights first letters of every word and lets you read faster

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Activate with keyboard shortcut (or by clicking the icon):
Windows: Ctrl + Shift + K
MacOs:  Cmd + Shift + K

Deactivate with:
Windows: Ctrl + R
MacOs:  Cmd + R

This plugin highlights first letters of every word (allows Bionic reading), by manipulating viewed web page and so some distortion might occur.

Tested on webpages I personally use, so if you notice any issues let me know please by providing the webpage address and I will try to fix it.
